name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - 3rd Anniversary Update
summary: To celebrate its 3rd Anniversary, a free update is available now to all #ACE7 players! This update features a payload of new cosmetics, including fourteen new skins, a new callsign, and seventeen new emblems!

videos.title: ACE COMBAT 7: Skies Unknown – 3rd Anniversary Trailer
